channel.title: Mechanics on Trojan TeaHouse
channel.description: Recent content in Mechanics on Trojan TeaHouse

item.title: Verification of the Existence of Normal Coordinates for Small Vibrations
item.description: For the first-order small vibrations of a mechanical system near its stable equilibrium position, there exist normal modes equal in number to its degrees of freedom.

item.title: Vibrations of an Elastic Body in a Gravitational Field
item.description: Small-amplitude vibrations of an incompressible elastic rope in a gravitational field.
